question: [Focus] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (131, 141), (143, 150), (120, 54).

qas.question: [Focus] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (131, 141), (143, 150), (120, 54).
[Calm] Deutsch: Berechne Flaeche und Umfang des Dreiecks mit Punkten (131, 141), (143, 150), (120, 54). Provide only the area.
[Check] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (131, 141), (143, 150), (120, 54). Provide only the perimeter.
